content: in this court case in bari italy in 2007 the court rejected the plaintiffs request to allocate certain properties in giovinazzo instead the court prepared a divisional plan to distribute the estate among the heirs taking into account the condition of the properties and the evidence presented the court also determined the legal costs to be paid by each party involved the court made a final ruling rejecting the plaintiffs request and ordering the costs to be paid the divisional plan assigns different properties to each heir based on their value the total value of the estate was determined to be 184460 euros the court postponed the approval of the divisional plan and scheduled a hearing for further discussion
